Microfracture show good result chondral lesion hip . However , microfracture regenerate normal hyaline cartilage . There grow evidence PRP improve articular cartilage healing . Injection PRP follow microfracture may help regeneration normal hyaline like articular cartilage together soft tissue healing , thereby improve patient ' early long-term outcome chondral healing .
